oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leroy Smith demo performances - 1980-03-18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various demo performances, as performed by Leroy Smith (performer) and recorded on March 18, 1980 and sent to Cedarwood Publishing Company.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leroy Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Forever's Not As Long As I Once Thought (Leroy Smith) -- (01:48) I'm Gonna Be A Pro Wrestler (Leroy Smith) -- (03:33) If I Had My Life To Live Over Again (Leroy Smith) -- (06:18) You Don't Have To Be Crazy, But It Helps (Leroy Smith) -- (08:13) Dancing Lady (Leroy Smith) -- (10:54) Love Don't Come As Easy For Some As It Does For Others (Leroy Smith) -- (14:09) Life Begins At 40 (Leroy Smith) -- (18:52) I Wonder What I Would Be Doing Tonight (Leroy Smith) -- (22:15) Sad Little Angel (Leroy Smith)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cedarwood Publishing Company; Smith, Leroy
